hotels.name: Cara Lodge Hotel
hotels.desc: Boutique colonial hotel, lush gardens, personalized service, intimate atmosphere
hotels.longDesc: A charming colonial-style lodge in Georgetown's heart offering personalized hospitality, beautiful gardens, and authentic Guyanese character perfect for families seeking local charm.

hotels.name: Rock View Lodge
hotels.desc: Jungle eco-lodge, rainforest immersion, wildlife viewing, rustic comfort
hotels.longDesc: A sustainable eco-lodge deep in Guyana's interior rainforest offering authentic jungle experiences, wildlife encounters, and eco-friendly accommodations for adventurous families.

restaurants.desc: Garden cafe serving fresh juices and Guyanese comfort food

restaurants.name: Bistro Caf√© & Bar
restaurants.desc: Local favorite for roti and Caribbean fusion dishes

restaurants.desc: Riverside lunch with views of river dolphins
restaurants.address: Iwokrama River Lodge - Kurupukari Crossing Essequibo River Kurupukari, Essequibo River

restaurants.name: Iwokrama River Lodge & Research Centre
restaurants.desc: Main dining facility at Iwokrama River Lodge offering Guyanese dishes

restaurants.name: The New Thriving Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Popular Chinese-Guyanese fusion spot near the seawall

restaurants.name: Blues Alley Club
restaurants.desc: Relaxed spot near airport route for final Guyanese meal
restaurants.address: 1073 Wisconsin Ave NW 1st Floor, Washington, DC 20007, USA

experiences.name: Guyana
experiences.desc: World's fastest-growing economy discovering ecotourism, pristine natural landscapes, emerging adventure hub
experiences.longDesc: Guyana is rapidly developing its ecotourism offerings using oil wealth, positioning itself as an overlooked paradise for nature lovers and adventurous travelers seeking authentic experiences away from crowded tourist destinations.

experiences.name: Pegasus Suites & Corporate Center (New Wing)
experiences.desc: Upscale modern hotel, excellent restaurants, business hub, family suites
experiences.longDesc: Georgetown's premier modern hotel featuring spacious family suites, multiple dining options, and full amenities ideal for comfortable family stays in the capital.

experiences.name: Almond Beach Resort
experiences.desc: Beachfront resort, water activities, pool facilities, relaxing getaway
experiences.longDesc: A scenic beachfront resort offering water sports, comfortable accommodations, and beach access, perfect for families seeking seaside relaxation on the coast.
experiences.address: False Sittee Point, 101 B, 101b Sitee River Road, Hopkins, Belize

experiences.name: De Churrascaria & Pizzaria Restaurante
experiences.desc: Brazilian churrascaria, premium meats, tableside service, elegant ambiance
experiences.longDesc: An upscale Brazilian steakhouse offering premium cuts carved tableside with all-inclusive salad bar, perfect for special family dinners and celebrations.

experiences.name: Realm Sky Bar & Steak House
experiences.desc: Local cuisine, multicultural fusion, casual dining, authentic flavors
experiences.longDesc: A popular casual restaurant serving authentic Guyanese and multicultural fusion dishes in a relaxed family-friendly setting with generous portions and local charm.

experiences.name: Sacred Ground Cafe
experiences.desc: Artisan coffee shop, fair-trade beans, cozy atmosphere, light breakfast
experiences.longDesc: A welcoming caf√© serving excellent fair-trade coffee, pastries, and light meals, perfect for morning family gatherings or afternoon coffee breaks in the city.
experiences.address: 1801 Cheyenne Blvd, Colorado Springs, CO 80906, USA

experiences.name: Oasis Cafe
experiences.desc: Contemporary bar, signature cocktails, entertainment, vibrant atmosphere
experiences.longDesc: A lively bar and entertainment venue offering craft cocktails, live music, and energetic nightlife atmosphere perfect for adult family members seeking evening entertainment.

experiences.name: Guyana National Museum
experiences.desc: Cultural heritage museum, indigenous exhibits, colonial history, educational displays
experiences.longDesc: Guyana's premier museum showcasing indigenous cultures, colonial history, natural history, and artifacts, offering educational and engaging exhibits for curious families.

experiences.name: Kaieteur Falls - Guyana
experiences.desc: World's highest single-drop waterfall, dramatic rainforest setting, scenic helicopter tours
experiences.longDesc: One of the world's most spectacular waterfalls deep in pristine rainforest, accessible by scenic helicopter tour, offering breathtaking natural wonder for adventurous families.

experiences.name: Iwokrama International Centre for Rainforest Conservation and Development
experiences.desc: Rainforest research center, guided nature walks, wildlife spotting, canopy tours
experiences.longDesc: A world-renowned rainforest research facility offering guided jungle expeditions, wildlife observation, and educational programs for families interested in tropical biodiversity.
experiences.photoAttribution: Iwokrama International Centre for Rainforest Conservation and Development
experiences.address: 49 High and, Barrack St, Georgetown, Guyana

experiences.name: Stabroek Market
experiences.desc: Historic iron market, colorful vendors, fresh produce, local crafts, cultural hub
experiences.longDesc: Georgetown's iconic Victorian iron market bustling with vendors selling fresh tropical fruits, vegetables, and local crafts, offering authentic cultural immersion and local flavors.

experiences.name: St George's Cathedral
experiences.desc: Historic wooden cathedral, architectural landmark, spiritual site, guided tours available
experiences.longDesc: A stunning wooden cathedral built entirely without nails, representing a remarkable architectural achievement and important cultural landmark worth visiting with families.

experiences.name: Enta' Fun Park
experiences.desc: Water park, splash pools, water slides, family activities, refreshing fun
experiences.longDesc: An exciting water park with slides, splash pools, and interactive water features, perfect for cooling off with young children and enjoying active family recreation.

experiences.name: Aroma Express
experiences.desc: Popular coffee shop in Georgetown serving specialty coffee, pastries, and light meals in a comfortable setting
experiences.address: 1889 F St NW, Washington, DC 20006, USA

experiences.name: The Wild Tales
experiences.desc: Indigenous-led wildlife spotting and medicinal plant identification
experiences.address: Mountain stream lodge Rupununi Saint Ignatius, Lethem

experiences.name: Iwokrama Canopy Walkway
experiences.desc: Suspended walkway through rainforest canopy with giant otters nearby
experiences.address: Iwokrama Forest Reserve Lethem to Georgetown Road Mauisparu

kidFriendly.name: Mahaica River Tours, Resort & Lodge
kidFriendly.desc: Calm water wildlife spotting for capybaras and caimans

a.name: Guyana Jungle & Waterfalls Family Adventure (8 Days)
a.description: Experience the world's most powerful single-drop waterfall, sleep in a rainforest lodge where jaguars roam, and discover a country where nature outnumbers people 100 to 1.
